data.title: Santa Clara University
data.meta_description: Santa Clara University - The Jesuit University in Silicon Valley
data.text:
HOORIA JAZAIERI • ILLUMINATE

Distressed at Work? These Colleagues Will Likely Be the Most Compassionate

If you’re feeling more distressed at work lately, you’re not alone. Employees are experiencing distress at unprecedented rates. But what types of colleagues will offer the most help in alleviating stress? The answer might surprise you.

Why Choose SCU

People of all backgrounds flourish here. One thing they have in common? They want to make a difference. Santa Clara students are driven to build a better, kinder, more humane, more sustainable planet. And everything they need is right here. With our Silicon Valley location, dedicated community of scholars, and opportunities inside and outside the classroom, we teach you to think critically, take risks, and take charge.

See Yourself Here
